commit.message:
* expr.c (use_group_regs): Don't call use_reg for MEMs.

From-SVN: r16046

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@

+
+	* expr.c (use_group_regs): Don't call use_reg for MEMs.
+

 	* i386/freebsd.h (ASM_COMMENT_START): Fix.
